document.text:
From: ' 
To:' 
Cc: '
r
)"  
Subject: FW: Epstein Case 
Date: Tue, 03 Sep 2019 19:05:05 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Attachments: 2019.08.28 Letter to OCME.pdf 
-   
As discussed, attached is the letter we submitted asking them to withhold certain documents. They came back today 
asking us to tell us what specific documents we want them to withhold, which I can do once I have the file. I'll keep you 
posted, thanks. 
From: (OCME) â€¢ed 
Sent: Tuesday, September 3, 2019 2:26 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
<Ma 
Subject: RE: Epstein Case 
I have now had the opportunity to discuss this request with both and our Chief Information Officer, and I am 
renewing my request that you provide a list of the specific documents and other materials that you are requesting the 
OCME not disclose. Additionally, I would appreciate the opportunity to speak with you briefly concerning the document 
that you have requested that OCME destroy, and that OCME has deactivated in the manner that I described to you last 
week. Please let me know when would be convenient for you; thanks. 
Office 
of Chief Medical Examiner 
421 E. 26th Street 
New York, NY 10016 
Tel: 
The information contained in this e-mail communication may be confidential and/or legally privileged and is for the use of the intended 
recipient only. If you are not the intended recipient, or an authorized employee or an agent responsible for delivering it to the intended 
recipient. the dissemination, distribution or reproduction of this communication or its contents (including any attachments) is prohibited. 
If you have received this communication in error, please notify us immediately by telephone or reply e-mail and permanently delete it and 
any copies from your system files. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, August 28, 2019 10:28 AM 
To: (OCME) 
Cc: 
Subject: Epstein Case 
Hi Florence, 
Per our discussion, please see attached. 
We are also requesting that OCME destroy its copy of the draft interview report, dated August 12, 2019, relating to the 
FBI's interview 
EFTA00020445

Please let us know if you have any questions. Thank you. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00020446
